title: Japanese Conversation Completion Quiz - Hard Mode
description: Complete the blanks in these Japanese conversation snippets. This quiz tests your ability to understand and use conversational Japanese effectively.
instructions: Type the appropriate word or phrase in Japanese using Romaji to complete the sentence.
The case (uppercase or lowercase) of your answer does not matter, as long as the spelling is correct.
After completing all questions, submit your answers for scoring.

items.question: Sumimasen, _______ nanji desu ka? (Excuse me, what time is it now?)
Ashita _______ ni ikimasu ka? (Are you going to the beach tomorrow?)
Kono hon o _______ kudasai. (Please lend me this book.)
Konban _______ o shimasu ka? (What are you doing tonight?)
Raishuu no doyoubi _______ desu ka? (Are you free next Saturday?)
Kore wa anata no _______ desu ka? (Is this your bag?)
Nihon ni _______ koto ga arimasu ka? (Have you ever been to Japan?)
Kyou tenki ga _______ ne. (The weather is nice today, isn't it?)
Osushi ga _______ desu ka? (Do you like sushi?)
Kippu o _______ de kaemasu ka? (Where can I buy tickets?)
